name: Byanat Holdings Limited
description: Developer of a SaaS analytics platform intended to scale and maintain connected infrastructure. The company's product simplifies device management, offering tools to monitor device health, manage connectivity, and troubleshoot issues remotely and combines connectivity management, and analytics, enabling businesses to make data-driven decisions and improve infrastructure availability and customer experience.
one_liner: Developer of a SaaS analytics platform intended to scale and maintain connected infrastructure. The company's product simplifies device management, offering tools to monitor device health, manage connectivity, and troubleshoot issues remotely and combines connectivity management, and analytics, enabling businesses to make data-driven decisions and improve infrastructure availability and customer experience.
